title: The Strange Disappearance of an Anti-AI Activist
description: Sam Kirchner wants to save the world from artificial superintelligence. He’s been missing for two weeks.
content: Before Sam Kirchner vanished, before the San Francisco Police Department began to warn that he could be armed and dangerous, before OpenAI locked down its offices over the potential threat, those who… [+17630 chars]
